div.ab: "(Column) 47:;Ptolemais, daughter of Petesouchos (the fuller);;(in left margin: drachmas 16 obols 19) orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 5, tax on the produce of olives obols 4 chalki 2, naubion obols 3, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1.5;;eparourion drachmas 3 obols 2, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 11 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 12 obols 3, surcharges obols 4.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 13 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;and Tasoucharion, daughter of Petesouchos;;orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 2 obols 3, tax on the produce of olives obols 2 chalki 2, naubion obol 1.5, surcharges obol 3.5 chalki 2;;eparourion drachma 1 obols 4, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 5 obols 4 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 6 obols 1.5, surcharges obols 2.5, in total drachmas 6 obols 4;;in total for the day drachmas 124 obols 18;;(Pharmouthi) 7 likewise:;Horos, son of Satabous, grandson of Horos, mother Theonis, drachmas 8;;Kalokeros alias Ptolemaios, slave of Tasiaipis, drachmas 20;;Charidion, daughter of Chairemon (Sarapias, sister of Chairemon the sack-weaver);;(in left margin: drachmas 24 obols 10) orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 5, tax on the produce of olives obols 4 chalki 2, naubion obols 3, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1.5;;eparourion drachmas 3 obols 2, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 11 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 12 obols 3, surcharges obols 4.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 13 obol 1.5 chalki 2; ;Dionysios, fatherless, mother Tepheros, drachmas 4;;Diodoros, fatherless, mother Thaisas, drachmas 8;;Orsenouphis, son of Petheus, grandson of Horion, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 8;;Heron, son of Petesouchos, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 4 obols 28;;Kephalon, son of Isidoros, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 4;;Petesouchos, son of Petesouchos, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Leonides, grandson of Petheus, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Anoubas, son of Horos, grandson of Anoubas, mother Tepheros, drachmas 4;;Valerius, fatherless, mother Valeria, drachmas 4;;Kollouthos, son of Ptollion through the agency of Longinus Maximus;; (his neighbor);; (Heron, son of Tepptoueis);;(in left margin: drachmas 20, obols 27) orchard taxes for the 12th year,apomoira drachma 1 obols 3, tax on the produce of olives obol 1.5, naubion obol 1, surcharges obols 2.5;;eparourion drachma 1 obol 0.5, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos obol 0.5;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 3 obols 4.5, surcharges obols 1.5, in total drachmas 4;;and Ptolemais alias Politta, motherless;;orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 2 obols 3, tax on the produce of olives obols 3.5, naubion obol 1.5, surcharges obols 4;;eparourion drachmas 3 obols 2, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1, in total drachmas 7 obols 4.5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 6 obol 1.5, surcharges obols 2.5, in total drachmas 6 obols 4;;Horion, son of Sisouchos, grandson of Sisouchos, mother Apollonous, drachmas 8."
